com.drone.trackme
Class ServerCommunicator

java.lang.Object
  com.drone.trackme.ServerCommunicator

public class ServerCommunicator
extends Object

Represents a class that is used to send and receive data from server.

Method Detail

receiveDataFromServer

public static InputStream receiveDataFromServer(List<NameValuePair> parameters,
                                                String url)
                                         throws ClientProtocolException,
                                                IOException,
                                                LoginException
Receives data from server. Executes http post request to server supplying a list of NameValuePair and returns xml as an InputStream if status is OK. If user provides wrong username and/or password, an LoginException is thrown with an appropriate message. In case of status that is not OK, another LoginException is thrown with error message.

Parameters:
parameters - list of NameValuePair that are sent to server
url - url used to send data to server
Returns:
Throws:
ClientProtocolException - if an client protocol exception occured
IOException - if an input or output exception occured
LoginException - if user provides wrong username and/or password
See Also:
InputStream

sendDataToServer

public static int sendDataToServer(List<NameValuePair> parameters,
                                   String url)
                            throws ClientProtocolException,
                                   IOException
Sends data to server. This method sends list of NameValuePair to server and returns status code of executed request. Http post request is executed.

Parameters:
parameters - list of NameValuePair that are sent to server
url - url used to send data to server
Returns:
status code of http request used to send data to server
Throws:
ClientProtocolException - if an client protocol exception occured
IOException - if an input or output exception occured
See Also:
NameValuePair
